programme.title: Dallas Mavericks at Golden State Warriors : NBA Basketball
programme.desc: Klay Thompson makes his emotional return to Golden State as his Mavericks play the Warriors. Thompson made up one half of the legendary Splash Brothers combo with Stephen Curry from 2011-2024, winning four NBA titles and earning five All-Star nods.

programme.title: Above the Rim: Philadelphia 76ers at Los Angeles Lakers : NBA Basketball
programme.desc: From Crypto.com Arena in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nets at Cleveland Cavaliers : NBA Basketball
programme.desc: The Nets continue a three-game road trip with a stop on the Lake Erie shores to play the Cavaliers. Brooklyn snapped a five-game series slide in the finale of the 2023-24 yearly set against Cleveland, as Cam Thomass 29 points paced a 120-101 win.

programme.title: Phoenix Suns at Dallas Mavericks : NBA Basketball
programme.desc: The Mavericks try to get back at the Suns. Phoenix leads the season series after winning its home opener 114-102 versus Dallas on Oct. 26. Kevin Durants (PHX) 31 points were enough to fend off a signature 40-point performance from Luka Doncic (DAL).

programme.desc: Ash Barty didnt feel the pressure to deliver after her maiden grand slam title.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nets at Cleveland Cavaliers : NBA Basketball
programme.desc: The Nets continue a three-game road trip with a stop on the Lake Erie shores to play the Cavaliers. Brooklyn snapped a five-game series slide in the finale of the 2023-24 yearly set against Cleveland, as Cam Thomass 29 points paced a 120-101 win.

programme.title: Dallas Mavericks at Denver Nuggets : NBA Basketball
programme.desc: The Nuggets welcome the Mavericks to the Mile High City. The sides have split the last 12 meetings after Denver won two of three last season. Nikola Jokic (DEN) averaged 19 points, 11.3 rebounds and 7.7 assists per game against Dallas in 2023-24.

programme.title: Sacramento Kings at San Antonio Spurs : NBA Basketball
programme.desc: DeMar DeRozan returns to San Antonio as his Kings take on the Spurs in a Veterans Day clash. DeRozan spent three seasons with San Antonio from 2018-2021 after arriving in a trade from Toronto. Sacramento has won eight of the last nine meetings.

programme.title: Brentford vs. AFC Bournemouth : Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Fresh off a momentous victory, Bournemouth head to London for a contest with Brentford. The Cherries halted Manchester Citys 32-match unbeaten streak in Premier League play on Nov. 2 as Antoine Semenyo and Evanilson scored in Bournemouths 2-1 win.

programme.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs. Southampton : Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Wolverhampton Wanderers play Southampton in matchround 11 of the Premier League. Wolves have won five consecutive meetings since a loss to the Saints in the FA Cup on Feb. 11, 2021. Southampton seek their first points on the road in 2024-25.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs. Fulham : Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: An all-London derby at Selhurst Park sees Crystal Palace welcome rival Fulham to the pitch. The Eagles lone home win this campaign was at the expense of another London foe, 1-0 over Spurs on Oct. 27. Fulham and Palace drew both matches last season.

programme.desc: Experts showcase the individuals who have shaped the Premier League through stories about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: Tottenham Hotspur vs. Ipswich Town : Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Newly-promoted Ipswich Town (0-5-5) seek their first win as they visit Tottenham Hotspur (5-1-4) in matchround 11 of the 2024-25 Premier League season. Spurs dropped a pair of 2-1 decisions to Ipswich during the 2001-02 campaign.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs. Newcastle United : Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Nottingham Forest (5-4-1) host Newcastle United (4-3-3) in matchround 11 of the 2024-25 Premier League campaign. High-flying Forest seek their fourth straight win in Premier League play. Newcastle are 1-2-2 on the road this season.

programme.title: Manchester United vs. Leicester City : Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Manchester United face Leicester City from Old Trafford in matchround 11 of the Premier League. Man United take the pitch for the sixth time in 18 days. Included in that stretch is a 5-2 victory over Leicester in the EFL Cups Round of 16 on Oct. 30.

programme.desc: Arsenal visit Chelsea in matchround 11 of the Premier League. Both clubs are 5-3-2 in 2024-25. The Blues loaned star winger Raheem Sterling to the rival Gunners on Aug. 30. Arsenal are 3-2-0 across their past five trips to Stamford Bridge.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: Showcasing the personalities who have shaped the Premier League era with a focus on the stories that resonate with international audiences.

programme.title: Premier League Netbusters
programme.desc: Highlights of all the action from recent Premier League matches, where top-performing teams compete to win the coveted title.

programme.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs. Southampton : Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Wolverhampton Wanderers play Southampton in matchround 11 of the Premier League. Wolves have won five consecutive meetings since a loss to the Saints in the FA Cup on Feb. 11, 2021. Southampton seek their first points on the road in 2024-25.

programme.title: West Ham United vs. Everton : Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: West Ham United (3-2-5) play Everton (2-3-5) in matchround 11 of the Premier League. On Oct. 29, 2023, the Toffees trotted into London Stadium to nail the Hammers 1-0. Sheffields Dominic Calvert-Lewin netted the lone tally for Everton.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs. Fulham : Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: An all-London derby at Selhurst Park sees Crystal Palace welcome rival Fulham to the pitch. The Eagles lone home win this campaign was at the expense of another London foe, 1-0 over Spurs on Oct. 27. Fulham and Palace drew both matches last season.

programme.title: Brighton and Hove Albion vs. Manchester City : Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Manchester City look to rebound as they travel south to take on Brighton and Hove Albion. Man City saw their 32-game unbeaten run in the Premier League snapped on Nov. 2 as Bournemouth stunned the Citizens 2-1. Brighton is 2-3-0 at home.

programme.title: Liverpool vs. Aston Villa : Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Aston Villa conclude a busy week on the road by matching up with Liverpool in matchround 11 of the Premier League. The Reds sit atop the table at 8-1-1 after beating Brighton 2-1. The Villans seek their first win at Anfield since 2014.

programme.title: Brentford vs. AFC Bournemouth : Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Fresh off a momentous victory, Bournemouth head to London for a contest with Brentford. The Cherries halted Manchester Citys 32-match unbeaten streak in Premier League play on Nov. 2 as Antoine Semenyo and Evanilson scored in Bournemouths 2-1 win.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs. Newcastle United : Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Nottingham Forest (5-4-1) host Newcastle United (4-3-3) in matchround 11 of the 2024-25 Premier League campaign. High-flying Forest seek their fourth straight win in Premier League play. Newcastle are 1-2-2 on the road this season.

programme.title: Tottenham Hotspur vs. Ipswich Town : Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Newly-promoted Ipswich Town (0-5-5) seek their first win as they visit Tottenham Hotspur (5-1-4) in matchround 11 of the 2024-25 Premier League season. Spurs dropped a pair of 2-1 decisions to Ipswich during the 2001-02 campaign.
